nodes.text: The Arranda family was a Human family from the planet of Alderaan. In the early stages of the Galactic Civil War, it consisted of Kalf Arranda, his wife Milessa and their children Tash and Zak. They were also related to a woman named Beryl, who had married the Shi'ido Moloch Hoole. In 0 BBY, Tash and Zak Arranda were orphaned when their parents died in the destruction of Alderaan, and were placed in the custody of their "uncle" Mammon Hoole, the brother of Moloch.
